title: Sauron's musical disguises in Rings of Power
description:
An analysis of Bear McCreary's music to Rings of Power, and how he disguises the theme for Sauron's deceptions as Annatar among elves.

Support my vision to make music theory inspiring and accessible by joining the Patreon and get access to extra material free through the Patreon shop. https://www.patreon.com/GalenDeGraf

Check out more of my music analysis videos about the music to Rings of Power (Bear McCreary) and The Lord of the Rings (Howard Shore)
https://youtu.be/j0SpAYg-ZiY
https://youtu.be/HVR02LCtIE0

RECOMMENDED/RELATED READING
Doug Adams, "The Music of the Lord of the Rings Films": https://amzn.to/4a59X6s

Disclaimer that some links in this description may be affiliate links, supporting the channel by providing a commission at no cost to you.

#musictheory #lordoftherings #ringsofpower
